onboarding_second_step_text.en: 📑 A checkup is a mini-survey that helps you evaluate the level of anxiety and stress and catch the connection between negative emotions and their causes 🧠 Why are checkups helpful? If you checkup regularly and systematically, you notice emotinal challenges on time and get insights on their causes with analytics

product_onboarding_diary_text.en: The path to happiness begins with systemic observation of the emotional state To do this, I have 📆 diary that will help you regularly record emotions and note what they are connected with One recording of emotions is called check

product_onboarding_therapists_chat_text.en: A unique feature of checks is that they greatly simplify communication with a psychologist a) Data about checks can be shared with a psychologist, plunging it into context before the start of the first session b) During your communication, the psychologist receives notifications about your checks to keep his hand on the pulse

product_onboarding_therapists_text.en: If you want to discuss your condition with someone, I will help you find an interlocutor a) I have 👋 tips — an anonymous exchange system of questions between users b) there are still experienced 👩🏻‍🦳 psychologists , with each of which you can contact directly through online chat

second_onboarding_step_text.en: Why not discuss your emotions? Inside there is a whole social platform where you can: - Anonymously ask for 👋 Advice from the community - Limitlessly ask questions from universal consciousness: neural network - Find a 👩🏻‍🦳 Psychologist to talk online by chat or video

third_onboarding_step_text.en: And more... for regular checkups you get sparks 💥 Sparks are like bonus points — spend them on sessions with psychologists: 1💥 = 2 cents And for the first checkup you instantly get 20 💥

new_year_game_menu_text.en: wow, well, year, tell me? So many things have happened that it is difficult to remember everything at once (and I want to forget something soon). Previously, at the end of the year there were so many worries and deeds, but now I want to hug loved ones and just be all together ❤️ I know what to do! Let's play ❄️ Mugs-snugs -we will sculpt them from warm words to become closer. The rules of the game are simple: 1️⃣ Throw your snowball with warm words to another person 2️⃣ Catch someone else's snowball immediately after!
new_year_game_menu_text.ru: Вау, ну и год, скажи? Столько всего произошло, что трудно вспомнить всё сразу (а что-то хочется скорее забыть). Раньше под конец года было так много забот и дел, а сейчас хочется обнять близких людей и просто быть всем вместе ❤️ Я знаю что делать! Давай играть в ❄️ Кружки-Снежки — будем лепить их из тёплых слов, чтобы стать ближе. Правила игры просты: 1️⃣ Брось свой снежок с тёплыми словами другому человеку 2️⃣ Лови чужой снежок сразу после!

new_year_game_no_note_found.en: Thank you! Soon you will receive a snowball from another person 🎁
new_year_game_no_note_found.ru: Спасибо тебе! Скоро и ты получишь снежок от другого человека 🎁

new_year_game_recording_tips_text.en: Write down your ❄️ Circle-Snow! to the right of the field where the text is typed, there is a button ⏺️ (a circle in a square). · Close it and say it, but how you let it go — the snow will be ready. · If instead of a mug in a square you see the microphone icon, just click on it once and the mode will switch. Try to record a circle for at least 10 seconds and wish a person at the other end of something pleasant in the new year 🥰
new_year_game_recording_tips_text.ru: Запиши свой ❄️ Кружок-снежок! Справа от поля, где набирается текст, есть кнопка ⏺️ (Кружочек в квадрате). · Зажми её и говори, а как отпустишь — снежок будет готов. · Если вместо Кружка в квадрате ты видишь значок микрофона, просто нажми на него один раз и режим переключится. Старайся записать кружок не меньше чем на 10 секунд и пожелай человеку на том конце чего-то приятного в Новом Году 🥰
